issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] macOS autobrew fails on homebrew-versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7923](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7923). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See e.g. https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/653768049#L97. According to https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/5734, there needs to be `brew untap homebrew-versions` before `brew update`, except this is happening in the Travis workflow in the setup stage, so we can't. Will need to change the travis-build config or base image upstream, or look for a different workaround.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7923?focusedCommentId=17048004) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6504
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6504>
